00024 class DisturbanceElement;
00025 class UserRightsMapInfo;
00026 class InfoSQL;
00027 class MC2BoundingBox;

00030 /*
00031  * Takes cares of disturbances within a map area. Works like a cache for the
00032  * database.
00033  */
00034 class TrafficMapInfo {
00035 public:
00036 
00037    typedef uint32 DisturbanceID;
00038    typedef uint32 NodeID;
00039    typedef uint32 CostFactor;
00040    typedef uint32 MapID;
00041    typedef std::vector<DisturbanceElement*> Disturbances;
00042    typedef std::set< NodeID > NodeIDs;
00043    typedef std::pair< NodeID, CostFactor > NodeIDCostFactor;
00044    typedef std::vector< NodeIDCostFactor > NodesWithDelays;
00045    typedef std::map< NodeID, const DisturbanceElement* > IDToDisturbanceMap;
00046    typedef std::vector< pair< NodeID, const DisturbanceElement* > > NodeIDsToDisturbances;
00047 
00051    explicit TrafficMapInfo( MapID id );
00052    ~TrafficMapInfo();
00053 
00060    bool load( InfoSQL& database );
00061 
00067    void updateDisturbances( Disturbances& updated, const Disturbances& removed );
00068 
00070    const Disturbances& getDisturbances() const;
00071 
00079    NodeIDsToDisturbances
00080    findNodeID( const NodeIDs& ids,
00081                const UserRightsMapInfo& userRights ) const;
00082 
00083    int getNodesWithDelays( const UserRightsMapInfo& userRights,
00084                            NodesWithDelays& delays ) const;
00085    // remove when we are done
00086    const IDToDisturbanceMap& getDisturbanceList() const;
00087 
00089    uint32 mapSize() const;
00090 
00092    const MC2BoundingBox& getMapBox() const;
00094    MapID getMapID() const;
00095 
00096 private:
00097    struct Impl;
00098    Impl *m_impl;
00099 };
